name: 2022 2nd International Conference on Computer, Control and Robotics
content: Proceedings: Submitted Papers to the conference will be subjected to the rigorous peer-review process. For accepted papers, it will be published in the ICCCR 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published and submitted to IEEE Xplore. Those papers will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main academical databases.
